-- auto-generated definition
create table TBL_SEC_MEMBER
(
    EMAIL       VARCHAR2(100)        not null
        constraint TBL_SEC_MEMBER_PK
            primary key,
    PASSWORD    VARCHAR2(100)        not null,
    NAME        VARCHAR2(100)        not null,
    REGDATE     DATE default sysdate not null,
    UPDATEDATE  DATE default sysdate not null,
    ENABLED     CHAR default 1       not null,
    FROM_SOCIAL CHAR                 not null
)
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table TBL_SEC_MEMBER_AUTH
(
    AUTH  VARCHAR2(255),
    EMAIL VARCHAR2(255) not null
        constraint TBL_SEC_MEMBER_ROLE_SET_FK1
            references TBL_SEC_MEMBER
)
/
